title: Skins for minions
body:
Random Brainstorming after seeing the pool party minions ,
Why don't they had minions skins in the shops, i would totally buy some and it has like the effect like baron buff how when you are near the minion
it gives them baron buff it should be like that with the skins
So vsing opponents in lane they could have diff minions skins yadayada?

replies.body:
Question:
How would you think this would work if more than one user has a minion skin?

(It does sound cool and i'd sure like it, hell, i'd probably buy one, but i can see where it'd get complicated)
But Barron buff for winions are a bit op in early game and what happens when other people with minion skin on your team come  for a gank?XD
^^ totally agree, or you can assign a lane at the start if you have it and the minions will spawn with that, if only riot focused on cool customizable things like that  ;-;
